nlmixTest function for testing

Source: R/utils.R
nlmixrTest.Rd

nlmixTest function for testing

nlmixrTest(expr, silent = .isTestthat(), test = "cran")

Arguments

expr

Expression for testing
silent

Boolean for testing
test

this represents the test group of the test

Value

Nothing, called for its side effects

Author

Matthew Fidler
